UI_visible_response: Qin Gang was dismissed from his position as China's foreign minister after being absent from public view for about a month. Initially, it was announced that he would step down due to health concerns5. However, further details or official explanations from government officials have not been provided, as they have refused to answer additional questions regarding the matter5. His dismissal became formal in July 2023, after only 207 days on the job1.
traffic_visible_response: Qin Gang was dismissed from his position as China's foreign minister after being absent from public view for about a month. Initially, it was announced that he would step down due to health concerns [[5]]. However, further details or official explanations from government officials have not been provided, as they have refused to answer additional questions regarding the matter [[5]]. His dismissal became formal in July 2023, after only 207 days on the job [[1]].
